response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value of $15,000, reflecting its unparalleled features and benefits. I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special offer tailored for discerning individuals like yourself, aiming to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring you experience the full potential of our product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
